content.detail: I put together this site in order to record the different projects I've worked on in product management, software engineering, human-computer interaction, and more. In developing the site, I wanted to establish a template system in order to detail each project based on their common elements such as tools and skills used, media, and other details.

content.subtitle: Style Theme
content.detail:
Regarding the style theming of the site, this updates every day and every season.

Every day, the theme of the site is light during the day and dark at night

The site has a light/dark theme toggle that users can manually change themselves. Light theme has a lighter background while dark theme has a darker background.
